name: stores_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool kohls.
Tool description: Get online shopping deals, discounts and rewards from fashion to beauty, home furniture, clothing, shoes, electronics and more...
API description: Returns a list of stores near the provided geographic location.

longitude.description: The longitude of the geographic location.

latitude.description: The latitude of the geographic location.

radius.description: The radius in miles to search for stores around the geographic location. Defaults to 25.
